title: Formula Bounty
author: Formula Bounty
created_time: January 26, 2023, 03:13:33 AMLast edit: January 26, 2023, 03:32:18 AM by Formula Bounty
content: ============================== Formula Bounty chat ==============================To participate you need a ACN WalletGOOGLE PLAY (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eco.acorn&hl=en)APPLE APP STORE (https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1492397384)BOUNTY POOL =  375 000 ACN•Facebook: 15%•Twitter: 10%•Reddit: 5%•Blog: 60%•Youtube: 10%===========================================================================GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS:•   If a participant is found to be used ill-practice for any campaign. A participant will be disqualified.•   Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.•   If rules set out in these campaigns are not followed, the participants will not be rewarded accordingly and no negotiation will be entertained.•   Disqualified members will lose the entire coins earned and this is irrevocable.•   The disqualified member will not be informed. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.•   The coins will be distributed at the end of the bounty program.•   Submission of work must be provided via the submission form. It is mandatory and the only way for the work results in acceptance. Only submitted work in the submission form will be counted for stakes.•   You can keep your work post in this thread (optional) to ensure the bounty claims later along with all other details asked in the submission form (as proof of stakes).•   Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating. It is a mandatory option.•   We will update the stakes [weekly].Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).200-500 Followers/Friends: 2 stake per week500-1500 Followers/Friends: 3 stakes per week1500-3000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week3000+ Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per weekParticipants must make minimum 5 shares per week, maximum 1 share per hour, 4 shares per day, and 12 shares per week.Rules:1. Join Telegram and Discord group:https://t.me/acorn_en  https://discord.gg/ZZcDHWpKE52. Participant accounts must be open.3. Use hashtags: #ACN #Blockchain #cryptocurrency and YOU MUST INCLUDE THESEIN YOUR posts/shares, otherwise they won't be counted.4. Accounts with fake friends/followers will be disqualified5. Friends/followers will NOT be updated after having registered in the campaign6. All shared articles must also be liked7. Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check yourwork.8. Posts must contain a link to the projectStakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 2 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 3 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 7 stakes per weekRules:1. Join Telegram and Discord group:https://t.me/acorn_en  https://discord.gg/ZZcDHWpKE52. Each Participant should join the official Twitter: https://twitter.com/AcornProtocol3. Minimum of 100 Follower only can join the Campaign.4. Report should be 5 minimum Retweet and 1 Tweet with the #ACN #Blockchain #cryptocurrency5. Tweet must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.6. All report must be on time or else you will get 0.7. If you have no new posts from our official Twitter account, kindly make a short post about ACN and use all of our official hashtag.8. Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check your work.Code:Week # :Twitter Profile LinkFollowers:Spreadsheet #:[b]Retweet[/b]1.2.3.4.5.[b]Tweet [/b]1.Stakes will be paid depending on karma (at the start of the campaign).30-60 post karma/ comment karma : 1 stake per week61-100 post karma/ comment karma : 2 stake per week101-300 post karma/ comment karma : 3 stake per week301+ post karma/ comment karma : 4 stake per weekRules:1. We reserve the right to not consider your Reddit account eligible if you are extremely low quality/bot etc.2. Your account must be at least 2 months old and have at least 50 posts or comment karma.3. External posts must link to the ACN website.4. Posts with negative karma will obviously not be accepted. Any kind of spam will not be rewarded either.5. Your post must be made in one of the following subreddit: r/cryptomoonshots, r/altcoin, r/defi and etc.6. We will award tokens based on the quality of the post. This will be based on the quality of the content, a number of upvotes, karma and how many comments it generates etc. We may take other criteria into account.7. Post must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.8. You can complete a total of 7 posts per week. A maximum of 2 posts per day.9. Low-quality contents will be denied without pay.10. Join Telegram and Discord group:https://t.me/acorn_en  https://discord.gg/ZZcDHWpKE5Code:Week # : Reddit Profile Link:Carma:  Spreadsheet #: Links of Reddit posts:1.2.3.4. We divide all kinds of content, including articles, blog posts into 3 categories:Excellent : 36 stakesVery good : 24 stakesGood : 12 stakesRules:1. You can use our official images, logos, graphics on our website.2. Articles should contain at least 500 characters.3. The article or description of the video should contain at least 1 link to our website. At least 1 link to your BTT profile should be indicated in the article or description of the video to prove your authorship.4. Only 5 posts from one user are accepted on the blogging platforms, like "Medium", "Steemit", etc.5. Articles must be interesting and aim to build this project.6. Join Telegram and Discord group:https://t.me/acorn_en  https://discord.gg/ZZcDHWpKE5Best Video: 72 stakesGood Video: 48 stakesMedium Video: 24 stakesLow Video : 12 stakes Rules:1. Join Telegram and Discord group:https://t.me/acorn_en  https://discord.gg/ZZcDHWpKE52. Video must be 2 minutes long.3. Videos must include link to the official website in the description.4. Must have your BitcoinTalk username in the description.5. Video mustbe published on a crypto related YouTube channel with minimum 150 subscribers.6. Plagiarism or use of other's material will be considered as an invalid submission.7. We would accept any positive video about ACN, not only about the ICO, but about the idea itself, use cases, benefits, ICO etc.8. No more than two videos from one person.9.The ACN website should be on the screen of your video. Here is the link to the site: https://acorn.eco/=========================WEEK 1 (25.01-31.01)=========================
